action.description: The type of action performed in the audit log.

action_label.description: A human-readable label representing the action.

actor_id.description: The ID of the actor (user) who performed the action.

actor_name.description: The name of the actor (user) who performed the action.

created_at.description: The date and time when the audit log entry was created.

id.description: Unique identifier for the audit log entry.

ip_address.description: The IP address from which the action was performed.

source_id.description: The ID of the source object related to the action.

source_label.description: A human-readable label representing the source object.

source_type.description: The type of the source object.

url.description: The URL associated with the action or source object.
